channel.title: I need help with the RevengeScape Server... Dont Flame
channel.description:
I know there's going to be a bunch of people saying oh im a noob, its so easy, dont code it if you dont know how, its more of a learning experience for me, so dont judge, i just need someone to help me with this, i know its a simple error, i just need to know what to do thats all, thanks and too all who flame, its all good.
Here's the error : When i run the server, I have it as C:/revengeScapeCache and i have the full cache, not the shit it leaves you with when you download it. I just dont know why server wont start up.
[15:16:05] [Server] Starting loading Cache... java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at dragonkk.rs2rsps.rscache.CacheManager.load(CacheManager.java:21) at dragonkk.rs2rsps.rscache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:17) at dragonkk.rs2rsps.Server.<init>(Server.java:23) at dragonkk.rs2rsps.Server.main(Server.java:38) Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: I need help with the RevengeScape Server... Dont Flame
item.dc:creator: @beats beats
item.description:
@beats wrote:

same problem. u got skype? so we can figure it out together

skype= negash.tat

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with the RevengeScape Server... Dont Flame

I know there’s going to be a bunch of people saying oh im a noob, its so easy, dont code it if you dont know how, its more of a learning experience for me, so dont judge, i just need someone to help me with this, i know its a simple error, i just need to know what to do thats all, thanks and too all who flame, its all good.

Here’s the error :
When i run the server,
I have it as C:/revengeScapeCache
